home.title: Short Form Books | Bite-Sized Stories for the Modern Bookworm
home.description: Dive into stories curated for the modern reader. From inspiring business tales to spine-tingling conspiracies, our diverse range is here to captivate your curiosity.

about.title: About Us | Short Form Books
about.description: We are a team of writers, editors, and designers who are passionate about the power of storytelling. We believe that great stories can change the world, and we want to make them accessible to everyone.
